quests.name: Leaving The Woods Behind
objectives: Get the Burned Logs from Kristoff's old campfire in the Forest of Valor.
Grind the Burned Logs into Ashes at a Crafting Station.
Boil the Ashes at any Cooking Station to extract Lye.
Bring the Lye to Kristoff.
Talk to Maui.

Gather the Soap ingredients for Kristoff:
  ‧ 20 Carrot
  ‧ 12 Coconut
Show Kristoff the Coconuts.
Craft the Carrot Soap.
Bring the Carrot Soap to Kristoff.

quests.name: Frozen Memories
objectives: Talk to Elsa

Gather the Ingredients for the spell:
  ‧ 6 Aquamarine
  ‧ 3 Swamp Water
Bring the ingredients to Elsa
Talk to Anna to get a lock of her hair.

Make sure you have Anna's Hair in your Inventory
  ‧ Anna's Hair
Bring Anna's Hair back to Elsa.
Place the Magic Ice Block somewhere in the Village.
Sculpt the Magic Ice Block using your Pickaxe.
Talk to Kristoff.

quests.name: Village Project: A Mountain Man's Stall
objectives: Talk to Goofy.

Gather the materials for a Stall:
  ‧ 50 Softwood
  ‧ 50 Stone
  ‧ 35 Hardwood
  ‧ 10 Iron Ingot
Return to Kristoff.
Craft Kristoff's Stall.
Place Kristoff's Stall anywhere you like in the Valley.
Talk to Kristoff.

quests.name: A Broken Sled
objectives: Follow Kristoff to his Sled.
Free Kristoff's Sled from the ice.
Retrieve the Sled.
Show Kristoff his broken Sled.
Get the book called "Ice-cident: How to Fix Your Sled" from the library in Kristoff's House.

Gather the materials for the repairs:
  ‧ 50 Fiber
  ‧ 30 Hardwood
  ‧ 10 Iron Ingot
  ‧ 9 Tinkering Parts
Repair the Sled at a Crafting Station.
Get the Sled and bring it back to Kristoff.
Bring the Sled back to Kristoff.

Get a sample of the following materials for Kristoff:
  ‧ Fiber
  ‧ Brick
  ‧ Glass
  ‧ Iron Ingot
Bring the samples of the refined materials to Kristoff.

quests.name: Kristoff: A Romantic in the Making
objectives: Drop or place 20 Flowers all around Arendelle Castle and water them. (20)
Cook 10 meals with Cocoa for Anna. (10)
Make sure you have the 10 meals with Cocoa in your Inventory. (10)
Bring the meals you cooked with Cocoa to Kristoff.
Return to Daisy.
